fr.sii.ogham.core.builder

Class ContentTranslatorBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.ContentTranslatorBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<ContentTranslator>

    public class ContentTranslatorBuilder
extends Object
implements Builder<ContentTranslator>
    Builder for constructing a chained translator. Each translator is able to handle a kind of content and to transform it into another content. This builder simplifies the definition of the translators to use. Each defined translator will be applied on each content.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public ContentTranslator build()
                        throws BuildException
        Generate a chain translator that delegates translation of content to all enabled translators.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder<ContentTranslator>
        Returns:
        the chain translator
        Throws:
        BuildException - when the translator couldn't be generated

      • withTemplate

        public ContentTranslatorBuilder withTemplate()
        Enable the management of templates using all default behaviors and values. It will use the default template engines. This method registers the translator that is able to convert a template into a String content.

        This method is automatically called when calling useDefaults().

        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use
        See Also:
        More information about the default behaviors., More information about the translator for templates

      • withTemplate

        public ContentTranslatorBuilder withTemplate(Properties properties)
        Enable the management of templates using all default behaviors and values. It will use the default template engines. This method registers the translator that is able to convert a template into a String content.

        This method is automatically called when calling useDefaults().

        Parameters:
        properties - the properties to use
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use
        See Also:
        More information about the default behaviors., More information about the translator for templates

      • withTemplate

        public ContentTranslatorBuilder withTemplate(TemplateBuilder builder)
        Enable the management of templates by delegating template engine construction to the specialized builder. It adds a new translator for templates that will use the provided template engine. The previous added ones are still available.

        This method is automatically called when calling useDefaults().

        Parameters:
        builder - the builder that helps to construct the parser to add
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use
        See Also:
        More information about the translator for templates, More information about the builder to use for helping to construct the template parser

      • withMultiContentSupport

        public ContentTranslatorBuilder withMultiContentSupport()
        Enable the management of multi-content messages (like email for example). It adds a new translator that will handle MultiContent contents. It will delegate each content management to the chain content translator built by this builder. It enables to apply the same translations to each content provided by the multi-content.

        This method is automatically called when calling useDefaults().

        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use
        See Also:
        More information about multi content management

      • withInlining

        public ContentTranslatorBuilder withInlining()
        Enable the management of resource inlining:
        • Inline CSS files into the HTML content
        • Inline image files into the HTML content

        This method is automatically called when calling useDefaults().

        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use
        See Also:
        More information about multi content management

      • useDefaults

        public ContentTranslatorBuilder useDefaults()
        Tells the builder to use all default behaviors and values. It will enable default template management and default multi-content support management.
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use
        See Also:
        More information about default template management, More information about default multi-content management, More information about default inlining management

      • useDefaults

        public ContentTranslatorBuilder useDefaults(Properties properties)
        Tells the builder to use all default behaviors and values. It will enable default template management and default multi-content support management.
        Parameters:
        properties - the properties to use
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use
        See Also:
        More information about default template management, More information about default multi-content management, More information about default inlining management

      • getTemplateBuilder

        public TemplateBuilder getTemplateBuilder()

        Get the builder used to handle template support.

        Access this builder if you want to:
        • Customize how template resources are resolved
        • Register a custom lookup mapping resolver for template resources
        • Use your own template engine
        • Customize the template engine configuration
        • Set the prefix and suffix for template resolution
        • Set the property key for prefix and suffix resolution
        Returns:
        the template builder
